Create a new read/write memory mapped file of a given size

Source: R/io.R
mmap_create.Rd

Create a new read/write memory mapped file of a given size

Usage

mmap_create(path, size)

Arguments

path

file path

size

size in bytes

Value

a arrow::io::MemoryMappedFile
